name: Teriyaki Chicken Stir Fry
description: A delicious and easy-to-make stir fry with tender chicken and veggies, coated in a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce.

name: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
description: A refreshing salad packed with quinoa, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese, drizzled with a tangy vinaigrette.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish made with spaghetti, crispy bacon, creamy sauce, and topped with Parmesan cheese.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: A colorful and nutritious stir fry loaded with assorted vegetables, tossed in a flavorful sauce.

name: Baked Salmon with Lemon and Herbs
description: Tender salmon fillets baked with fresh lemon slices, garlic, and aromatic herbs for a simple yet elegant dish.

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
description: A healthy and satisfying parfait made with creamy Greek yogurt, fresh berries, and crunchy granola.
